i1.name: Garden of Thorns
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Zyra''' spawns one or two {{as|Seeds|wild}} nearby that last for 30 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} over the surrounding area for 1 second.
After 1 second, enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} can destroy {{as|Seeds|wild}} by stepping on them.
'''Zyra''' can only have a total of 8 ''Seeds'' planted at a time, preserving {{as|Seeds|placed}} spawned by {{ai|Rampant Growth|Zyra}} over {{as|Seeds|wild}} spawned by ''Garden of Thorns''.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Zyra spawns one or two Seeds nearby that last for 30 seconds, granting sight over the surrounding area for 1 second.
After 1 second, enemy champions can destroy Seeds by stepping on them.
Zyra can only have a total of 8 Seeds planted at a time, preserving Seeds spawned by Zyra's Rampant Growth over Seeds spawned by Garden of Thorns.
i1.notes:
* '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} in brush and not on top of walls.
* '''Zyra''' tries not to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} too close together and at different angles.
* '''Zyra''' does not plant any {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} if she is concealed within a brush (unless there is an enemy ward in it, in which case it takes her a little longer to plant the {{as|Seed|buzzword}}) or when there is no room for additional ones.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} close to an enemy near her.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} under enemy structures only if she is in basic attack range of them.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} on the other side of the wall she is facing and/or standing right next to.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} in the direction she is facing and/or moving.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} near jungle path entrances.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} behind herself when she is walking through the river and there are no jungle path entrances near her.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} between herself and the enemy champion she has vision of (or is heading towards her) in a 45º angle to the left or to the right depending on where on lane she is standing.
* {{Pending for test}}: '''Zyra''' tries to plant {{as|Seeds|buzzword}} against the inner walls of epic monster pits ({{ui|Dragon}}, {{ui|Rift Herald}}, {{ui|Baron Nashor}})
* '''Zyra''' has a hidden passive that grants her 10% increased [[size]] for {{tt|33 seconds|Estimated}} after having {{cai|Sunlight|Leona}} applied to her.

q1.name: Deadly Spines
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zyra''' sprouts thorny spines at the target location that appear after a {{fd|0.625}}-seconds delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area.

If ''Deadly Spine'' hits a ''Seed'', it sprouts into a [[File:Zyra Deadly Spines Render.png|20px|link=Zyra/LoL#Pets]] ''[[Zyra/LoL#Pets|Thorn Spitter]]'', which remains on the battlefield for 8 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zyra sprouts thorny spines at the target location that appear after a 0.625-seconds delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area.
If Deadly Spine hits a Seed, it sprouts into a File:Zyra Deadly Spines Render.png Zyra/LoL#Pets, which remains on the battlefield for 8 seconds.

w1.name: Rampant Growth
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Zyra''' periodically stores a {{as|Seed|placed}}, up to 2. Killing an enemy unit grants 20% charge toward a {{as|Seed|placed}}, increased to 100% for large enemy units and whenever scoring an enemy {{tip|champion}} {{tip|takedown}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zyra''' plants a {{as|Seed|placed}} at the target location, which lasts for 60 seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} over the surrounding area, though decreasing in radius after 1 second.
After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, enemy champions can destroy {{as|Seeds|placed}} by stepping on them, but doing so {{tip|true sight|reveals}} them for 2 seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Zyra periodically stores a Seed, up to 2. Killing an enemy unit grants 20% charge toward a Seed, increased to 100% for large enemy units and whenever scoring an enemy champion takedown.
Active: Zyra plants a Seed at the target location, which lasts for 60 seconds and grants sight over the surrounding area, though decreasing in radius after 1 second.
After 1.5 seconds, enemy champions can destroy Seeds by stepping on them, but doing so reveals them for 2 seconds.
w1.notes:
* {{as|Seeds|placed}} are {{tip|untargetable}} to enemies.
** They can be targeted by allied abilities ({{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}).

e1.name: Grasping Roots
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zyra''' sends a surge of vines in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within their path and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for a duration.

If ''Grasping Roots'' hits a ''Seed'', it sprouts into a [[File:Zyra Grasping Roots Render.png|20px|link=Zyra/LoL#Pets]] ''[[Zyra/LoL#Pets|Vine Lasher]]'', which remains on the battlefield for 8 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zyra sends a surge of vines in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within their path and rooting them for a duration.
If Grasping Roots hits a Seed, it sprouts into a File:Zyra Grasping Roots Render.png Zyra/LoL#Pets, which remains on the battlefield for 8 seconds.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Root Duration:

r1.name: Stranglethorns
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zyra''' summons a monstrous thicket at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area as it expands.
After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies within the area for 1 second.

{{ai|Garden of Thorns|Zyra|Plants}} hit by the thicket become enraged, restoring {{as|{{sti|health|50% of their '''current''' health}}}}, increasing their {{as|{{sti|health|'''maximum''' health by 50%}}}}, gaining 25% increased [[size]] and refreshing their duration while the thicket expands. Additionally they attack in a flurry, launching two shots per attack, dealing {{ft|150% damage per flurry.|75% damage per shot.}}
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zyra summons a monstrous thicket at the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area as it expands.
After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward, knocking up all enemies within the area for 1 second.
Zyra's Plants hit by the thicket become enraged, restoring 50% of their current health, increasing their maximum health by 50%, gaining 25% increased size and refreshing their duration while the thicket expands. Additionally they attack in a flurry, launching two shots per attack, dealing
r1.notes:
* {{ai|Garden of Thorns|Zyra|Plants}} grown during the 2 seconds prior to the displacement will also be enraged.
* {{ai|Garden of Thorns|Zyra|Plants}} already grown before ''Stranglethorns'' is cast will have their duration refreshed if they are inside the area of effect.
* ''Stranglethorns''\' buff on {{ai|Garden of Thorns|Zyra|Plants}} lasts 10 seconds, however the ''Plants'' normally die naturally after 8 seconds.
